LanguageData.TD.SettingDeliverAny: Deliver resources even if there's not enough to finish the building
LanguageData.TD.SettingBlockingJobs: Make other jobs clear things for blueprints
LanguageData.TD.SettingBlockingJobsDesc: Plant cutters and miners will clear away things for blueprints.\n\n(There are reports that this is making right-clicking something slow, so disable this to probably fix that.)
